==Useful info==
'''Hairy devils''' were boring [[tier-4 demon]]s which had no remarkable traits. They could be found in [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], the [[Hell]]s, and were occasionally summoned through the [[Summon Demon]] spell.

==Tips & Tricks==
None needed. Be glad that it wasn't something nastier like a [[smoke demon]] or [[neqoxec]].

==History==
Hairy devils were removed from the game in [[0.11]].
